item.title: London TAD Online Meetup
item.description:
I was invited to speak at Test Automation in DevOps London online event. I presented my talk Automation in Mobile Testing.

I talked about:

  • Automation principles
  • How to scope your automation for mobile apps
  • How to design the architecture
  • How to decide and choose tools
  • How to maintain continuous testing for mobile

item.title: QA Financial Digital Forum
item.description:
I was invited as a keynote speaker at QA Financial Digital Forum. I presented my talk Crafting Regulatory Compliance in Modern Software Development.

I talked about how modern Software Development practices such as CI/CD, automated testing and documentation can craft regulatory compliance as a part of the agile process.
